item.title: Export ass with motion blur in Maya
item.author: Author
item.description: Export ass with motion blur in Maya Enable motion in Maya render setting. Then you can render this ass with motion blur in other DCC such as Houdini.

item.title: HtoA set camera background image
item.author: Author
item.description: HtoA set camera background image Create an Arnold shader network in SHOP and connect the nodes like this. Set the state_float node with X & Y. Finally, set the Environment shader parameter to this shop node, under the Arnold ROP. tags: Htoa Houdini Arnold ROP out render
